description: Navigate to 為食貓士多. Head southwest along the street, keeping the red brick building (Union Plaza) on your left. Pass the Wellcome supermarket and continue straight. The destination, 為食貓士多, is located in the building on the left, marked by a yellow sign on the facade.
agent_concise_description: Head southwest along the street, keeping the red brick building (Union Plaza) on your left. Pass the Wellcome supermarket and continue straight. The destination, 為食貓士多, is located in the building on the left, marked by a yellow sign on the facade.
